page.title: 07Home Life in North Duffield
page.content: We interviewed one of North Duffields villagers.She first gets up at 7.30 a.m and gets breakfast at 8.00a.m which takes about 10 minutes,after which she sits down and eats it.After this she washes up.At 9.00 a.m she starts her hairdressing job until 12.00 p.m when she prepares lunch. After she's eaten it,it is time to wash up. Then at 1.00 p.m she starts house work till 3.30 p.m .She sits down and rests for 30 minutes at 4.00 p.m gets dinner ready for family.Then they eat it.After they wash up and then they sit down or do various things like knitting, sewing, watching television or gardening.After this she has a bath, then goes to bed at about 11.00 p.m.
